posts.postText:

No thread for this yet so here it is.


Games are
-ARES
-Gemini Rue
-Sanctum
-Nimbus

Individual steam keys on the games so you can gift certain ones if you already own one.
More bundles should be following this one afterwards so mark your calenders.

Game on.
will someone buy me this bundle? ;~;

>> Damn you, Windows-only bundles. 

Oh-ho, that REALLY sucks for you, bud. (Time to switch to a PC?)

Tin, you may be mistaken:
 http://i.minus.com/iEcR2kPMKgydA.png?q=0.72437006063 

In other news, I bought it, I already had Sanctum and Nimbus though.
I would have paid for just those two, they are amazing games, and all of you should buy this bundle.
(Haven't tried the other two, ARES is downloading and GEMINI is not through steam, so Imma wait before downloading it.

Gift me sanctum and nimbus funny? :D

Off-Topic: Pirate says he can't tele me to xalton, so lead me there sometime?

I bought it for $10 the second I saw it on the blog, later checked steam and realized I just could have bought Gemini Rue for $8 (but now I got 3 Sanctum DLC for it, so I still got a great deal, and supporting the developers). Also the keys are intended for personal use of the buyer or person receiving the gift URL

http://i877.photobucket.com/albums/ab332/Destar_01/untitled.png 
New games! Get them while they're cheap!
